name: Action Item Extraction
description: Extract actionable items and tasks from content
template:
Please extract all action items and tasks from the following content:

Content:
{content}

Action Item Extraction Requirements:
- Identify specific, actionable tasks
- Include responsible parties if mentioned
- Extract deadlines and timelines
- Note priority or urgency indicators
- Format as: [Action] - [Owner] - [Deadline] - [Priority]
- Focus on: {focus_type}

Action Items:

variables.name: content
variables.description: The content to extract action items from

variables.name: focus_type
variables.description: Type of actions to focus on
variables.default_value: immediate next steps and concrete deliverables

author: Selene System
